profiles.label: Windows Local Policy Baseline
profiles.description: Sample GPO template that can be applied to Windows agents via secedit.
profiles.template:
[Unicode]
Unicode=yes

[Version]
signature="$CHICAGO$"
Revision=1

[System Access]
MinimumPasswordLength = 10
MaximumPasswordAge = 42
PasswordComplexity = 1
PasswordHistorySize = 24

[Event Audit]
AuditSystemEvents = Success
AuditLogonEvents = Success and Failure
